scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Erin (from Long Island, NY)
scrape.text: Very well written.. I have to admit & can absolutely appreciate how rapt i was. But it did get old & ultimately the actual story just didn't do it for me.🤷🏻‍♀️ I'd say it was more of a character study.. But these characters just weren't enough (good or bad) imo.
